TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BinaryServerFormatterSink extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelSinkBase, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSink
Public Class BinaryServerFormatterSink Implements IChannelSinkBase, IServerChannelSink

summary.span: 为使用 的服务器格式化程序接收器提供实现。

span.span: Provides the implementation for a server formatter sink that uses the .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 直到它达到适当的格式化程序接收器，从服务器传输接收器通过服务器信道接收器将传播的请求流。The request stream propagates from the server transport sink through the server channel sinks until it reaches the appropriate formatter sink. 格式化程序接收器反序列化消息，并将其传递通过管道。The formatter sink deserializes the message and passes it through the pipeline. 通过通道接收器链的结尾处插入特殊调度接收器方法，它由可创建通道接收器链的服务器的服务器通道调用。A special dispatch sink is inserted at the end of the channel sink chain by the method, which is called by server channels to create the server channel sink chains. 当消息到达调度接收器时，调度接收器将消息传递到远程处理基础结构。When the message reaches the dispatch sink, the dispatch sink passes the message to the remoting infrastructure. 下表显示的接收器可以为当前的接收器提供程序指定的配置属性。The following table shows the sink configuration properties that can be specified for the current sink provider. |PropertyProperty|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| |`includeVersions`|指定格式化程序是否将包括版本信息。Specifies whether the formatter will include versioning information. 值`true`或`false`。Values `true` or `false`.| |`strictBinding`|指示在仅使用类型名称和程序集名称（无版本信息）之前，接收格式化程序首先试着使用完整的版本信息（如果有的话）来标识类型。Indicates that a receiving formatter will first try to identify the type using complete version information if it exists before using only the type name and assembly name without version information. 值`true`或`false`。Values `true` or `false`. 系统提供的两个格式化程序的默认值均为 `false`。The default for both system-provided formatters is `false`.| |`typeFilterLevel`|一个字符串值，指定服务器信道尝试的自动反序列化级别。A string value that specifies the level of automatic deserialization that a server channel attempts. 支持的值为`Low`（默认值） 和`Full`。Supported values are `Low` (the default) and `Full`. 反序列化级别详细信息，请参阅[ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/313a0e88-5b2b-4a17-8391-0ddf9f7a787b)。For details about deserialization levels, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/313a0e88-5b2b-4a17-8391-0ddf9f7a787b).

只能由.NET Framework 版本 1.1 以下平台上支持此属性： Windows 98、 Windows NT 4.0、 Windows Millennium Edition、 Windows 2000、 Windows XP Home Edition、 Windows XP Professional 和 Windows Server 2003 系列。This property is supported only by the .NET Framework version 1.1 on the following platforms: Windows 98, Windows NT 4.0, Windows Millennium Edition, Windows 2000, Windows XP Home Edition, Windows XP Professional, and Windows Server 2003 family.| > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用此对象的实例与不受信任的数据或在不安全通道会带来安全风险。Using an instance of this object with untrusted data or across an unsecure channel is a security risk. 使用此对象仅与受信任的数据以及跨安全通道。Use this object only with trusted data and across a secure channel. 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据验证](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代理的作业是将转换为消息调用的方法调用。The proxy's job is to convert a method call that is invoked on it into a message. 消息，这实现接口时，传递从客户端到服务器端通过调用对消息接收器对象。The message, which implements the interface, is passed from the client end to the server end by invoking on message sink objects. 消息的接收器被链接在一起，这意味着每个消息接收器负责调用对下一个消息的接收器后的当前消息接收器已完成其工作。Message sinks are chained together, which means that every message sink is responsible for calling on the next message sink after the current message sink has finished its work. 例如，与同步相关的消息接收器可能会导致锁获取或发布并委派给下游消息接收器。For instance, a synchronization-related message sink might cause a lock to be acquired or released and delegated to the downstream message sink. 当格式化程序通道接收器获取一条消息，需要通过通道发送，它调用，将消息作为参数传递。When the formatter channel sink gets a message that needs to be sent over the channel, it calls , passing the message as a parameter. 格式化程序接收器然后创建的传输标头数组和调用上格式化程序接收器。The formatter sink then creates the transport header array and calls on the formatter sink. 此调用沿接收器链中，转发并且任何接收器均可创建将传递回格式化程序接收器的请求流。This call is forwarded down the sink chain, and any sink can create a request stream that will be passed back to the formatter sink. 完成此操作后调用返回后，消息序列化，接收器链中的第一个链调用和消息传递到通道接收器。After this call returns, the message is serialized, is called on the first chain in the sink chain, and the message is passed to the channel sinks. 通道接收器收到消息后，它们可以将数据写入到流、 将标头添加到标头的数组，并转发到下一步接收器调用之前将自己添加到接收器堆栈。After the channel sinks get the message, they can write data to the stream, add headers to the header array, and add themselves to the sink stack before forwarding the call to the next sink. 当调用达到传输接收器链末尾时，传输接收器发送标头，并通过到服务器，此过程被反转其中通道序列化消息。When the call reaches the transport sink at the end of the chain, the transport sink sends the headers and serialized message over the channel to the server, where the process is reversed. 当消息到达的服务器端时，传输接收器将检索标头和序列化流中的消息并将这些通过接收器链转发，直到达到格式化程序接收器。When the message gets to the server side, the transport sink retrieves the headers and serialized message from the stream and forwards these through the sink chain until the formatter sink is reached. 然后，格式化程序接收器反序列化消息，并将其转发到远程处理基础结构。The formatter sink then deserializes the message and forwards it to the remoting infrastructure. 然后，远程处理基础结构将消息转换的方法调用，并调用该 server 对象。Then, the remoting infrastructure turns the message into a method call, and calls the server object.

summary.span: 获取或设置 执行的自动反序列化的 值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of automatic deserialization that the performs.

value.span: 表示当前自动反序列化级别的 。

span.span: The that represents the current automatic deserialization level.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支持的值为`Low`（默认值） 和`Full`。Supported values are `Low` (the default) and `Full`. 反序列化级别详细信息，请参阅[.NET 远程处理中的自动反序列化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/313a0e88-5b2b-4a17-8391-0ddf9f7a787b)。For details about deserialization levels, see [Automatic Deserialization in .NET Remoting](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/313a0e88-5b2b-4a17-8391-0ddf9f7a787b).
